item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description:
Fall 2023

  • 10/4/23 - Data-centric Architecture Support for Security, Yuanchao Xu (UCSC)

  • 10/18/23 - Challenges and Opportunities to Accelerate ML Inference with Sparsity, Zhibin Xiao (Moffett.AI)

  • 11/1/23 - Reflections on Trusting TrustHUB, Christian Krieg (TU Wien)

  • 11/8/23 - EMISSARY: Enhanced Miss Awareness Replacement Policy for L2 Instruction Caching, Nayana Nagendra (Arm)

  • 11/15/23 - Opportunities and Challenges for In- and Near-Memory Computing for Machine Intelligence, Siddharth Joshi (Notre Dame), @s14joshi

Spring 2023

  • 4/12/23 - Scaling up Server Performance via In-Memory Processing, José Martínez (Cornell)

item.title: Publications
item.description:
2024

  • Rui-Jie Zhu, Qihang Zhao, Guoqi Li, Jason Eshraghian, SpikeGPT: Generative Pre-trained Language Model with Spiking Neural Networks. Trans. Mach. Learn. Res. 2024, 2024.

  • Heiner Litz, Natalia Vassilieva, Special Issue on Hot Chips 2023. IEEE Micro 44(3), 6-7, 2024.

  • Ishita Chaturvedi, Bhargav Reddy Godala, Yucan Wu, Ziyang Xu, Konstantinos Iliakis, Panagiotis-Eleftherios Eleftherakis, Sotirios Xydis, Dimitrios Soudris, Tyler Sorensen 0001, Simone Campanoni, Tor M. Aamodt, David I. August, GhOST: a GPU Out-of-Order Scheduling Technique for Stall Reduction. ISCA, 1-16, 2024.
